mainText: 'Yep, tutorials for this will be easy to make and understand'

'You can modify the game as you please, so you can make your own skin/cosmetics. Not saying YouTubers only, everyone can. I was just saying as a YouTuber you could make your own world and record with your own skin/cosmetics.
But only you, or servers that use your mod, would see it!'

summary: Simon, re: custom models/avatars in private worlds/servers
mainText: 'Correct! As a YouTuber you could do this'

summary: Simon, re: Prowl wanting to use his own persona for his skin
Oscar, re: user saying Simon's waffling nonsense
mainText: 'You're rage-baiting. Simon's argument about providing bigger modding freedom on an indie platform makes total sense for a creatively centered game like Hytale.'

'We are doing what most games do with avatar creation - there was a blog post many years ago: https://hytale.com/news/2019/2/customizing-your-character-in-hytale
Not sure if it's still up to date, but it looks correct from a glance.

We will add tons more free customization as we go, so most people will be able to achieve what they want with the base character. 

I know people are used to Minecraft and Roblox, but it's a decision that's better in the long term for the health of the game. You will have to trust and see for yourself that this will allow us to support very neat features. I will explain more in the coming weeks!'

summary: Oscar, re: user saying Simon's waffling nonsense
mainText: 'You're rage-baiting. Simon's argument about providing bigger modding freedom makes sense.'

summary: Oscar, re: AI not stifling creativity
mainText: 'You might think so, but in reality you're handing over your own agency.'

summary: Oscar, re: user calling his 'use OST freely, no AI' post cringe
Oscar, re: making a video of Hytale's general composition style
Oscar, re: making/sharing arrangements/transcripts of Hytale OST
mainText: 'Of course, you can sell them too'

summary: Oscar, re: impossible to tell AI music apart from human music
mainText: 'I disagree! Don't underestimate your power to leave your unique mark on something. That's something AI can't take away from you. AI is generalized perfection. You are a diamond in the rough. Just like Aladdin.'
